pages.title: IR Seeker
pages.text: $(bold)A friendly reminder to watch your back!$() Stack nose->tail: ordinance_ir_seeker_head, ordinance_core, ordinance_thruster. Place horizontally with the seeker head facing forward.

pages.name: Layout
pages.text: Left to right = tail to nose. Thruster (T) at the rear, core (0) mid, seeker head (H) forward.
